title: Aural set, Symph no. 40 - largest interval

content.description: You will hear an excerpt consisting of two phrases from a symphony. The first phrase of the excerpt will be played twice. Then the second phrase will be played twice. Finally, the entire excerpt will be played once. Before listening to each phrase, please read the questions.
content.question: In the first phrase, the largest interval played by the violins is

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
